articles.content:
Clubs in the English Football League recorded 112 positive tests for coronavirus among staff and players during a week of testing.
A total of 66 EFL clubs underwent mandatory testing for the first t… [+10203 chars]

articles.title: Mauricio Pochettino sets sights on Sergio Aguero as first headline transfer as PSG boss - Mirror Online
articles.description: New Paris Saint-Germain boss Mauricio Pochettino wants Manchester City legend Sergio Aguero on a free transfer in the summer as he settles back into management
articles.content:
Mauricio Pochettino has Sergio Aguero in his sights for a free transfer at the end of the season.

articles.title: Kevin De Bruyne's Man City contract stand-off linked to potential Lionel Messi transfer - Mirror Online
articles.description: The Belgian midfielder has rejected City's first offer of a new deal and there is now doubt over his long-term future at the club
articles.content:
